statements: SELECT * FROM compliance_information WHERE regulation = 'GDPR';
SELECT id, domain, audit_date FROM compliance_information WHERE compliance_status = TRUE;
SELECT domain, regulation FROM compliance_information WHERE audit_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM compliance_information WHERE compliance_status = FALSE ORDER BY audit_date DESC;
SELECT id, domain, regulation, audit_date FROM compliance_information ORDER BY domain ASC, audit_date DESC;
SELECT id, domain, regulation, audit_date, compliance_status FROM compliance_information WHERE audit_date >= '2021-01-01' AND compliance_status = TRUE
SELECT domain, regulation, audit_date FROM compliance_information WHERE compliance_status = FALSE ORDER BY audit_date DESC
SELECT domain, COUNT(*) AS number_of_records FROM compliance_information GROUP BY domain HAVING number_of_records > 1
SELECT domain, regulation, compliance_status FROM compliance_information WHERE regulation LIKE '%GDPR%' ORDER BY domain ASC, compliance_status DESC
SELECT domain, regulation, audit_date FROM compliance_information WHERE domain IN ('Finance', 'Technology', 'Healthcare')
SELECT * FROM compliance_info
SELECT company_name, audit_date FROM compliance_info
SELECT id, company_name FROM compliance_info WHERE audit_date='2022-01-01'
SELECT * FROM network_security WHERE status='secure'
SELECT device_name, ip_address FROM network_security
SELECT * FROM compliance_info WHERE audit_date = '2022-01-01';
SELECT company_name, audit_date FROM compliance_info WHERE id = 10;
SELECT id, company_name FROM compliance_info ORDER BY audit_date DESC;
SELECT company_name, audit_date FROM compliance_info WHERE company_name LIKE 'A%';
SELECT * FROM network_security WHERE status = 'vulnerable' AND ip_address LIKE '192.168.%';
SELECT id, department FROM compliance_info;
SELECT * FROM audit_log WHERE action = 'LOGIN';
SELECT log_id, timestamp, user_id FROM audit_log WHERE user_id = 123456;
SELECT department, regulation, compliance_status FROM compliance_info WHERE compliance_status = 'Compliant';
SELECT event_id, event_timestamp, event_description FROM security_events ORDER BY event_timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM compliance_info WHERE department = 'Finance' AND compliance_status = 'Compliant';
SELECT department, regulation FROM compliance_info WHERE compliance_status = 'Non-Compliant';
SELECT * FROM audit_log ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT user_id, action, result FROM audit_log WHERE result = 'Success' ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT event_type, event_description FROM security_events WHERE event_timestamp > '2022-01-01';
SELECT company_name, regulatory_compliance_status FROM compliance_information;
SELECT audit_id, audit_type, auditor_name FROM network_security_audit ORDER BY audit_date DESC;
SELECT control_name, control_description FROM security_controls WHERE compliance_status = true;
SELECT violation_type, violation_description, violation_date FROM security_violations WHERE violation_date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT * FROM compliance_information JOIN security_violations ON compliance_information.id = security_violations.violation_id;
SELECT * FROM compliance_information WHERE regulatory_compliance_status = 'Compliant';
SELECT company_name, audit_date FROM compliance_information ORDER BY audit_date DESC;
SELECT control_name, compliance_status FROM security_controls WHERE compliance_status = TRUE;
SELECT violation_type, violation_date FROM security_violations WHERE violation_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM network_security_audit WHERE pass_fail_status = 'Fail' ORDER BY audit_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM compliance_info;
SELECT compliance_name, compliance_score FROM compliance_info WHERE compliance_score > 80;
SELECT * FROM audit_log ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT device_name FROM network_devices WHERE device_type = 'Router';
SELECT user_id, role_id FROM user_roles WHERE user_id = 123;
SELECT * FROM compliance_info;
SELECT compliance_name, compliance_score FROM compliance_info WHERE compliance_score > 90;
SELECT compliance_name, compliance_description FROM compliance_info WHERE compliance_score < 50 ORDER BY compliance_name DESC;
SELECT user_id, action, timestamp FROM audit_log WHERE action = 'LOGIN' AND user_id = 123;
SELECT device_name, device_type, last_audit_timestamp FROM network_devices WHERE last_audit_timestamp > '2021-01-01' ORDER BY last_audit_timestamp ASC;
